item.title: List of all call centers in Bangladesh
item.description: Bangladesh emergency call centers number for hotline help organized by Bangladesh Government. All call centers help free of cost. These emergency contacts are free of cost. You can get 24/7 online help in case of emergency situation eg. legal, crime, public service, health, general health, mother & kids health, pregnancy period help, community support, international help, National helpline center for violence against women, National Emergency Hotline Number, Covid help, etc.
